metadata.title: CVE-2016-3765 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: decoder/impeg2d_bitstream.c in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-07-01allows attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory orcause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted application,aka internal bug 28168413.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
